original_text: When they drink it, they will walk like people who are drunk. They will seem to be crazy, because they know that I will send armies to attack them.’
korean_text: 그들이 마시고 비틀거리며 미친 듯이 행동하리니 이는 내가 그들 중에 칼을 보냈기 때문이니라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: they will walk like people who are drunk
They will seem to be crazy
that I will send armies to attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 공격하기 위해 군대를 보낼 것이라는 것을
